ModMetaData.name: No more consume!
ModMetaData.author: Zhuma
ModMetaData.description: This mod makes fuel in generator's, campfire's, torch's, brazier's, etc. infinite! (You still need to refuel it once, so they will start working!) Also, mod makes item's like: Psychic shock lance, Psychic insanity lance, Orbital bombardment targeter, Smokepop pack, Jump pack, etc. have infinite charges! Item's like: Psychic soothe pulser, Psychic animal pulser are not infinite! This mod should work with all moded generators, artifacts, belts who use default "CompRefuelable.ConsumeFuel" (For generators, etc.), and "CompReloadable.UsedOnce" (For lances, belts, etc.) methods.
